pageProduct.name: Aveeno Daily Moisturising Creamy Oil Lotion 300ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Drag to spin

General Information

Aveeno® Daily Moisturising Creamy Oil, with a rich, non-greasy formula with sweet almond oil that moisturises for 24 hours.

Aveeno® Daily Moisturising Creamy Oil, has a rich, non-greasy formula with sweet almond oil that moisturises for 24 hours.

It helps prevent, protect and nourish dry skin without the greasy after-feel of a body oil. The formula with colloidal oatmeal improves the skin's natural balance for healthy looking and more resilient skin from the first use.

Suitable For: Sensitive skin

Size: 300mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Softens Normal to dry skin
• Non-greasy formula
• Suitable for sensitive skin
• Colloidal oatmeal and sweet almond oil


Ingredients

Aqua, Paraffinium Liquidum, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Avena Sativa Kernal (Oat) Flour, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Carbomer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum [PR-0001907]

Directions

Apply to hands and body or wherever skin feels dry.
